ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Contact_status__c ),"Active"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Contact_status__c ),"Inactive") ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Contact_status__c , 'New Contact Creation'), ISPICKVAL(Contact_status__c , 'Pending DS Team Approval') )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contact Status cannot be moved to "New Contact Creation" or "Pending DS Team Approval" from "Active / Inactive".
